predicate.note: Frames file for 'shun' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: In many other institutions , scientists are shunning contacts with venture investors until the NIH policy is settled [*-1] .
example.arg: until the NIH policy is settled [*-1]

example.name: another transitive
example.text: Investors , he advises [0] [*T*-1] , `` should be cautious , '' [*-2] holding fewer stocks than usual and also shunning bonds .
